programme.title: End of Watch
Posljednja patrola
programme.desc: End of Watch: Directed by David Ayer. With Jake Gyllenhaal, Michael Peña, Natalie Martinez, Anna Kendrick. Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends, and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1855199/","name":"End of Watch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMxNjU0ODU5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjI4MzAyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends, and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1855199/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mattyp083"},"dateCreated":"2012-08-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazing dichotomy of emotions","reviewBody":"Jake and Michael have the most amazing on-screen chemistry that makes the viewers believe they're truly best friends and police partners. The way the script was written allowed David Ayer to elicit an incredible range of emotion from the viewers. It's hilariously funny during car scenes between Jake and Michael, playing on relatable awkward topics of sex, dating, and other things best friends would joke about, yet incredibly serious, showing just how intense and dangerous police officers' jobs in South Central LA can be. The use of Jake's hand-held camera gives a Paranormal Activity feeling (without the headache) that adds to the "realness" of the film. I highly recommend this film and challenge anyone to not be completely moved by the end of it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236912,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-12-12","keywords":"video footage,street gang,police,lapd,police officer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Version -- #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3486098713","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1MTUwNjU3MDdeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDQ0NzQxMzg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1MTUwNjU3MDdeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDQ0NzQxMzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two young officers are marked for death when they confiscate money and firearms from the members of a notorious cartel during a routine traffic stop. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350453/","name":"Jake Gyllenhaal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0671567/","name":"Michael Peña"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0447695/","name":"Anna Kendrick"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043742/","name":"David Ayer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0234935/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017712/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0365905/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043742/","name":"David Ayer"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Color Out of Space
Boja iz svemira
programme.desc:
Color Out of Space: Directed by Richard Stanley. With Nicolas Cage, Joely Richardson, Madeleine Arthur, Elliot Knight. A secluded farm is struck by a strange meteorite which has apocalyptic consequences for the family living there and possibly the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5073642/","name":"Color Out of Space","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ1YTM4M2UtMTQxNS00YjdjLTgwZGYtZTgzYmFiYjFkYzNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A secluded farm is struck by a strange meteorite which has apocalyptic consequences for the family living there and possibly the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5073642/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jtindahouse"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cage looks right at home in a surprisingly dark and crazy little film","reviewBody":"A lot of people might think that Nicolas Cage's career has become a shell of its former self, but I get the impression he quite enjoys doing the types of films he does these days. Obviously long gone are the days of big blockbuster films where his star-power was enough to carry a film all by itself, but much like Shia LaBeouf what he is doing currently looks a lot more fun and up his alley. He seems to love the freedom to go absolutely crazy with a role and basically do whatever he wants. He's not bad at it either. He was quite captivating to watch in 'Color Out of Space' as were the entire cast for that matter.

This is an extremely visually unique film. The use of colours in the film (a part of the plot - sort of at least) is incredibly beautiful and makes the film very distinct and memorable for that reason alone. Also the film is a lot darker than I expected it to be. Around the halfway point in the film something happens that really took me off-guard and and took the film to another level in terms of brutality.

I feel like Stephen King would like to have his name to a film like this. Back in the day when he still cared about his writing this is the kind of story he would've created. The only downside of the film to me was the ending. It felt a bit flat and uncreative, almost like they couldn't think of a proper and fitting way to conclude it. I wouldn't say I loved 'Color Out of Space' but I enjoyed it enough for it to be passable.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":41864,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2021-08-10","keywords":"meteorite,farm,alpaca,farmhouse,hydrologist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi735493913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmM3MGQyZDEtYTFiMi00MzFiLWE4ODQtY2NiMzMzYzIyZjUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmM3MGQyZDEtYTFiMi00MzFiLWE4ODQtY2NiMzMzYzIyZjUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000115/","name":"Nicolas Cage"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000613/","name":"Joely Richardson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4699715/","name":"Madeleine Arthur"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0822582/","name":"Richard Stanley"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0440557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0692305/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0244345/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0522454/","name":"H.P. Lovecraft"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0822582/","name":"Richard Stanley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4214064/","name":"Scarlett Amaris"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bosch
Bosch
programme.desc: Bosch: Created by Eric Ellis Overmyer. With Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Lance Reddick. An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3502248/","name":"Bosch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDBiYjg4OTgtZDg2YS00ZGIzLTk3ZWMtZWRlZDQ5M2I0MDNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3502248/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"c_l_costa"},"dateCreated":"2014-02-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"More please!","reviewBody":"As a huge fan of Michael Connelly's Bosch books, I was looking forward to seeing this pilot and I wasn't disappointed. Titus Welliver is the perfect Bosch, the rest of the cast are just as brilliant and the writing and production are both spot on. The story line is in fact two Bosch books woven into one and it has been done very cleverly. Bosch fans have been waiting for twenty years for this character to be put onto film but for me, it was worth the wait. I would dearly love to see this made into a complete series. Titus Welliver is as brilliant as always and has the tormented look behind his eyes that any Bosch fan would expect to see. He may not physically resemble Harry but that is soon forgotten. An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3502248/","name":"Bosch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDBiYjg4OTgtZDg2YS00ZGIzLTk3ZWMtZWRlZDQ5M2I0MDNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3502248/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"c_l_costa","dateCreated":"2014-02-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"More please!","reviewBody":"As a huge fan of Michael Connelly's Bosch books, I was looking forward to seeing this pilot and I wasn't disappointed. Titus Welliver is the perfect Bosch, the rest of the cast are just as brilliant and the writing and production are both spot on. The story line is in fact two Bosch books woven into one and it has been done very cleverly. Bosch fans have been waiting for twenty years for this character to be put onto film but for me, it was worth the wait. I would dearly love to see this made into a complete series. Titus Welliver is as brilliant as always and has the tormented look behind his eyes that any Bosch fan would expect to see. He may not physically resemble Harry but that is soon forgotten. programme.title: Glup i gluplji
programme.desc: Ostavljeni na pragu sirotišta koje vode časne, novorođenčad Moe, Larry i Curly odrastaju na svoj poseban, luckast način i upadaju u nevolje na dotad neviđene načine. Ostavljeni na pragu sirotišta koje vode časne, novorođenčad Moe, Larry i Curly odrastaju na svoj poseban, luckast način i upadaju u nevolje na dotad neviđene načine. Sada se njihov dom iz djetinjstva možda zatvori zbog financijskih teškoća. Ali Larry, Curly i Moe, zaposleni u sirotištu kao nesposobni serviseri, odlučni su ga spasiti. Samo njih trojica mogu se upetljati u neobičan pokušaj ubojstva i istodobno dobiti glavne uloge u fenomenalno uspješnom televizijskom reality showu.

programme.title: Bosch
Bosch
programme.desc: Bosch: Created by Eric Ellis Overmyer. With Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Lance Reddick. An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3502248/","name":"Bosch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDBiYjg4OTgtZDg2YS00ZGIzLTk3ZWMtZWRlZDQ5M2I0MDNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3502248/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"c_l_costa"},"dateCreated":"2014-02-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"More please!","reviewBody":"As a huge fan of Michael Connelly's Bosch books, I was looking forward to seeing this pilot and I wasn't disappointed. Titus Welliver is the perfect Bosch, the rest of the cast are just as brilliant and the writing and production are both spot on. The story line is in fact two Bosch books woven into one and it has been done very cleverly. Bosch fans have been waiting for twenty years for this character to be put onto film but for me, it was worth the wait. I would dearly love to see this made into a complete series. Titus Welliver is as brilliant as always and has the tormented look behind his eyes that any Bosch fan would expect to see. He may not physically resemble Harry but that is soon forgotten. Watch, enjoy, rate and share!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":59261,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-02-06","keywords":"father daughter relationship,homicide detective,police procedural,police detective,based on novel","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0920038/","name":"Titus Welliver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0373100/","name":"Jamie Hector"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0032628/","name":"Amy Aquino"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483993/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420833/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0319272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0653899/","name":"Eric Ellis Overmyer"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Watch the Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3258368025","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU4MWFhMWYtMjdmNi00ZDNkLWI4NWMtNWJiNjBlYjFkMmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU4MWFhMWYtMjdmNi00ZDNkLWI4NWMtNWJiNjBlYjFkMmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bosch
Bosch
programme.desc: Bosch: Created by Eric Ellis Overmyer. With Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Lance Reddick. An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3502248/","name":"Bosch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDBiYjg4OTgtZDg2YS00ZGIzLTk3ZWMtZWRlZDQ5M2I0MDNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3502248/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"c_l_costa"},"dateCreated":"2014-02-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"More please!","reviewBody":"As a huge fan of Michael Connelly's Bosch books, I was looking forward to seeing this pilot and I wasn't disappointed. Titus Welliver is the perfect Bosch, the rest of the cast are just as brilliant and the writing and production are both spot on. The story line is in fact two Bosch books woven into one and it has been done very cleverly. Bosch fans have been waiting for twenty years for this character to be put onto film but for me, it was worth the wait. I would dearly love to see this made into a complete series. Titus Welliver is as brilliant as always and has the tormented look behind his eyes that any Bosch fan would expect to see. He may not physically resemble Harry but that is soon forgotten. Watch, enjoy, rate and share!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":59261,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-02-06","keywords":"father daughter relationship,homicide detective,police procedural,police detective,based on novel","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0920038/","name":"Titus Welliver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0373100/","name":"Jamie Hector"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0032628/","name":"Amy Aquino"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483993/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420833/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0319272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0653899/","name":"Eric Ellis Overmyer"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Watch the Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3258368025","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU4MWFhMWYtMjdmNi00ZDNkLWI4NWMtNWJiNjBlYjFkMmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU4MWFhMWYtMjdmNi00ZDNkLWI4NWMtNWJiNjBlYjFkMmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: La vérité: Directed by Hirokazu Koreeda. With Catherine Deneuve, Juliette Binoche, Ethan Hawke, Clémentine Grenier. A stormy reunion between scriptwriter Lumir with her famous mother and actress, Fabienne, against the backdrop of Fabienne's autobiographic book and her latest role in a Sci-Fi picture as a daughter of a mother who never grows old." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8323120/","name":"La vérité","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDJjMTVhMzMtOTQwNC00MzVkLWE3YjMtMjkwYTQ0YzEyMjBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODY3Nzc0OTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A stormy reunion between scriptwriter Lumir with her famous mother and actress, Fabienne, against the backdrop of Fabienne's autobiographic book and her latest role in a Sci-Fi picture as a daughter of a mother who never grows old.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8323120/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Xstal"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"'My memories, my book'...","reviewBody":"If you wrote your own book to tell your own story how close would your memories be to reality and how much would you conjure up, especially in relation to your relations and relationships. El crack cero: Directed by José Luis Garci. With Carlos Santos, Miguel Ángel Muñoz, Luisa Gavasa, María Cantuel. In this prequel, Germán Areta leaves his position as a policeman to become a private detective in post-Francoist Spain." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6793710/","name":"El crack cero","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTU1M2U4OWUtZTQ5OS00OWM1LTljN2EtMWJmZDgxNzUwZGNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA0MjU0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In this prequel, Germán Areta leaves his position as a policeman to become a private detective in post-Francoist Spain.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6793710/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"r-95017"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty bad","reviewBody":"Filmed in black and white, the acting is pretty woeful, it's difficult to want to pay attention when you're constantly confronted with examples or poor editing. It's so bad at times it made me wonder if it's deliberate.

The script has dramatic style to it, adding to the abstract lack of warmth for the characters. I get that he is a PI but I hope nobody has ever needed to look into the distance so many times in 2 hours.

I think it's also generally inconsistent, revelling in what I imagine were seen as character development and setting the seen comes across as predictable. Even the music annoyed me","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":649,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-10-04","keywords":"detective","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tráiler [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3987455769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjM4YmVjNmItZDA5OC00OWZiLTg5ZGEtMWU3NDY5YzA5NDgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjM4YmVjNmItZDA5OC00OWZiLTg5ZGEtMWU3NDY5YzA5NDgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1685281/","name":"Carlos Santos"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0616475/","name":"Miguel Ángel Muñoz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0310459/","name":"Luisa Gavasa"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0305054/","name":"José Luis Garci"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012941/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0305054/","name":"José Luis Garci"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1913805/","name":"Javier Muñoz"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Petnaestogodišnji Oskar popularan je u svojoj novoj srednjoj školi. No, kad njegovi kolege iz razreda saznaju da je Židov, prijete mu i brutalno ga maltretiraju. Dok ravnatelj ignorira molbe njegovih... Petnaestogodišnji Oskar popularan je u svojoj novoj srednjoj školi. No, kad njegovi kolege iz razreda saznaju da je Židov, prijete mu i brutalno ga maltretiraju. Dok ravnatelj ignorira molbe njegovih roditelja, Oskar mora pronaći vlastite načine kako se nositi s poniženjima. Priča se temelji na stvarnim događajima.

programme.title: Urbane legende
programme.desc: Naše urbane legende priče su koje su se prenosile generacijama te su sada postale dio urbanog folklora. Ali jesu li istinite? Ova emisija komičnih skečeva daje pomalo ironičan, vragolast - i namjerno dvosmislen - pogled na značajne priče o dobro poznatim povijesnim, umjetničkim i kulturnim ličnostima, koje su se možda zaista dogodile, a možda i nisu.

programme.title: Lara
Lara
programme.desc: Lara: Directed by Jan-Ole Gerster. With Tom Schilling, Mala Emde, Rainer Bock, Maria Dragus. It's Lara's 60th birthday, and this very evening, her son will be giving his debut piano concert. Lara mapped out his musical career. But Lara is not welcome at his debut performance. Even if Lara engages, everything gets out of control." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7275830/","name":"Lara","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTAxYTk0MjctN2M4YS00ZDA0LWE1MDctNzhiMjA5NjA2MmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUyNjM3ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"It's Lara's 60th birthday, and this very evening, her son will be giving his debut piano concert. Lara mapped out his musical career. But Lara is not welcome at his debut performance. Even if Lara engages, everything gets out of cont","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7275830/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CitizenDevi"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great and different follow-up to Oh Boy.","reviewBody":"The first movie I ever saw at a film festival, albeit it that the Ludwigsburger Lichtspielliebe is a very very new and very very very small and adorable little film festival with only one screening room. But that counts and is all very well done, and the director and lead actor showed up after the film for a fairly lengthy discussion. Lara was one of my most anticipated movies of this year because I love the first film Jan-Ole Gerster did, Oh Boy. This one yet again tells a big story in a down to earth and believable form where the way characters act and speak tells you all you need to know about them, and then some. Yet again it's also about family and being in a bad place in life. Lara, different from his first film, is for a big part about passion and creativity, and it's beautifully directed and written, and of course the performances are great. I'm very happy it turned out so well and hope it won't take Gerster seven years again to put out a new film. I don't know what took him so long, maybe it was just about financing. Anyway, see this one if you can please, it's definitely worth a watch and so full of life, never boring, always being real, and you can tell they really cared about making this as good as it can be. This is a film everyone will be able to get something out of. Fittingly, at one point a character thinks to himself, does the world really need my music or has it been done already and is pointless. I can tell you Lara is thankfully anything but pointless."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1856,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2019-11-07","keywords":"60th birthday,mother son conflict,piano teacher,suicidal thoughts,mother son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi977779737","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY0MTNlYzktNWQxZi00MzRjLThmZTEtZjZlZjZjOWU4NjZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY0MTNlYzktNWQxZi00MzRjLThmZTEtZjZlZjZjOWU4NjZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771713/","name":"Tom Schilling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3605549/","name":"Mala Emde"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0090674/","name":"Rainer Bock"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1673756/","name":"Jan-Ole Gerster"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323020/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051615/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002254/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3092424/","name":"Blaz Kutin"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kerosin
Kerozin
programme.desc: Kerosin: Directed by Yusup Razykov. With Valeri Maslov, Evgenija Molotova, Inna Stepanova, Elena Susanina. The fantastic story about the power of simple people, capable of living and surviving in the most complex circumstances, about love, loyalty and beauty." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10146198/","name":"Kerosin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDc1MzA1YmUtOTBjNS00ZmZiLWE0NGMtYmZmZTVlYjA2YzNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjk1NzAxNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The fantastic story about the power of simple people, capable of living and surviving in the most complex circumstances, about love, loyalty and beauty.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10146198/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Kirpianuscus"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"from Porozhin","reviewBody":"Porozhin is a Russian village, like many others. One its people, an old woman, preserving the memory of his late husband, being happy when her daughter and granddaughter visits her, having need of a little pig in a sort of version of Pig story by Ion Creanga , punishing the killers of her granddaughter in a manner remembering The Virgin Spring by Ingmar Bergman , having the chance than a rich man being very generous with her. A film about Russia more than about a venerable woman. Beautiful in a sense than only by the Easterns can be understand, maybe defined. A story with mythical embroideries about lonely life, survive, injustice and a form of profound peace. Maybe, an useful testimony. Sure, a beautiful film."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":112,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-03-26","keywords":"loyalty","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11400286/","name":"Valeri Maslov"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11400285/","name":"Evgenija Molotova"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3756556/","name":"Inna Stepanova"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0713689/","name":"Yusup Razykov"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0713689/","name":"Yusup Razykov"}],"duration":"PT1H17M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Goldfinger
Goldfinger
programme.desc:
Goldfinger: Directed by Guy Hamilton. With Sean Connery, Gert Fröbe, Honor Blackman, Shirley Eaton. While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0058150/","name":"Goldfinger","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2MzE0OTU3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjQxNTgzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0058150/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ToldYaSo"},"dateCreated":"1999-07-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"The superlative James Bond film","reviewBody":"First of all, I must state for the record, Sean Connery is THE James Bond. Even though the first Bond film I ever saw was "For Your Eyes Only" with Roger Moore. I was very young and very much drawn in. I have seen every one of the Bond films and without a doubt, "Goldfinger" is the finest the 007 saga has to offer.

Before I had begun an appreciation of the Connery films, i.e. before I'd seen them, a good friend and cartooning mentor, Ross Paperman, sorted me out. He helped me see how Connery's Bond was suave and sophisticated but also demonstrated a quality the other Bonds do not portray: fear. Not a panicky soil-your-pants kind of fear, mind you. But Connery's Bond actually has a few anxious, sweat-soaked-brow moments. A perfect example is when Bond is strapped to a table as Goldfinger's captive with a laser beam primed to cut him in half. 007 has to think fast. "Do you expect me to talk?" "No, Mr. Bond, I expect you to die!" A famous scene and line from Bond's most enjoyable film.

Perhaps what makes the earlier films more enjoyable is that they had fresh, innovative elements that have now become cliché and gimmicky. The new films are often stale and already covered ground and they don't even appear to be trying anymore.

But it's more than that. Even watching "Goldfinger" today, having seen all the latest in special effects and technology that Hollywood has to offer, it still is riveting and thoroughly entertaining. That is also without the added advantage of being overly nostalgic about "Goldfinger". How could I? I hadn't even been born when it first hit theaters, and it was far from my first 007 experience. The story, the characters and the fun of "Goldfinger" is timeless and if given a chance could probably rope in a whole new generation of fans. It just doesn't seem likely to happen.

Much of the satire from the Austin Powers films is directly derived from the Connery films, especially "Goldfinger" and "Dr. No", proving their lasting effect on popular culture. As well, John Barry's scores from the Connery films are finding their way into the ears of a new generation through pop music as snippets from his soundtracks are sampled by such artists as Robbie Williams, Mono and Curve, to name a few.

But if by some fluke you read this and you haven't seen "Goldfinger" yet, do yourself right and acquaint yourself with the real James Bond. You'll probably be hooked by the time you hear Shirley Bassey's voice in the famous opening theme.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":181545,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1964-09-20","keywords":"official james bond series,gold,aston martin,race against time,british secret service","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Goldfinger","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2383218457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ4NDI5YTEtZGMzMS00ZmM3LWI0YzctYWQ5OWIzYjc3MGYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ4NDI5YTEtZGMzMS00ZmM3LWI0YzctYWQ5OWIzYjc3MGYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Goldfinger"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000125/","name":"Sean Connery"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002085/","name":"Gert Fröbe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000303/","name":"Honor Blackman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0357891/","name":"Guy Hamilton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054040/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0537363/","name":"Richard Maibaum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0214989/","name":"Paul Dehn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001220/","name":"Ian Fleming"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Operation Crossbow
Operacija Grom
programme.desc: Operation Crossbow: Directed by Michael Anderson. With Sophia Loren, George Peppard, Trevor Howard, John Mills. Allied agents attempt to infiltrate the Nazis' rocket research site." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0059549/","name":"Operation Crossbow","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWZkZGQwZjctYWI4MS00MmY1LTg0OWUtMGNlOTE1NWMyMTcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQzNDI3NzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Allied agents attempt to infiltrate the Nazis' rocket research site.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0059549/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bb64"},"dateCreated":"2005-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Secret Mission To Destroy The German V-1 & V-2 Weapons Threatening England","reviewBody":"This is actually a very good movie with a lot more truth behind it than one might imagine. As this is a British movie, it was a very smart marketing idea to have a famous American actor, George Peppard, and a famous Italian actress, Sophia Loren, co-star in it. This way they could say "Starring (insert famous British actor name here)" when marketed in Britain, and advertise it as "Starring George Peppard" and "Starring Sophia Loren", when marketed in the U.S.A.and Italy respectively. This gives the makers of the film a much larger audience than just Britain. George Peppard and Sophia Loren have significant roles, but are not the stars of the movie. Details like portraying Hanna Reitsch and having accurate, and very good special effects make this far better than most World War II movies. Especially since most of the stars of the movie don't survive. If you enjoy historical accuracy, a well thought-out plot, and the unexpected, then I think you will find this movie a top-notch production and well worth watching. Without spoiling the ending, I will tell you though that the Gemans did not win the war.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4604,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"1965-08-30","keywords":"rocket,v2,spy thriller,british,world war two","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000047/","name":"Sophia Loren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000577/","name":"George Peppard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002145/","name":"Trevor Howard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0027183/","name":"Michael Anderson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071784/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0171385/","name":"Duilio Coletti"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0678008/","name":"Vittoriano Petrilli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0696247/","name":"Emeric Pressburger"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Star Trek: Directed by J.J. Abrams. With Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Leonard Nimoy, Eric Bana. The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0796366/","name":"Star Trek","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE5NDQ5OTE4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTE3NDIzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0796366/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"coj_lewis"},"dateCreated":"2009-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Star Trek for a new generation","reviewBody":"I am proud to call my self a Trekkie, I attend conventions, dress up and I even have "Live Long and Prosper" tattooed on my back. My family however, despite my best efforts, will watch the occasional episode but have never embraced the Star Trek world as I have. My husband took me along to the premier of Star Trek in London last night and thank you JJ you converted him in one film, I have been trying for 25 years! What JJ Abrams has done is create a film that can be enjoyed by all, its irrelevant whether or not you have seen Star Trek before, this film stands alone as brilliant entertainment. There are plenty of references to the original series to keep the fans happy. Of course there are going to be the "hard core" fans who will criticize certain aspects. I enjoyed seeing the lead actors imitate the characteristics of the original crew, Karl Urban as Dr Mcoy was particularly good. Good story line, plenty of humour, non-stop fast action, fantastic special effects, great acting from all the main "crew", Zacchary Quinto and Chris Pine especially. Can't wait for the next one to see more in-depth character development (of all the characters, not just Kirk and Spock and a moral dilemma which is at the heart of the best Star Trek. Film fans are going to love this film and that means Star Trek Lives Long and Prospers!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":591144,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-05-13","keywords":"automobile,car,part of series,bra,father son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Star Trek: Final Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1761608473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDE2MzczMDE3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTY4NzY3MjI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDE2MzczMDE3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTY4NzY3MjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the final theatrical trailer for Star Trek, directed by J.J. Abrams."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1517976/","name":"Chris Pine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0704270/","name":"Zachary Quinto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0670408/","name":"Simon Pegg"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0009190/","name":"J.J. programme.title: Goldfinger
Goldfinger
programme.desc:
Goldfinger: Directed by Guy Hamilton. With Sean Connery, Gert Fröbe, Honor Blackman, Shirley Eaton. While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0058150/","name":"Goldfinger","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2MzE0OTU3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjQxNTgzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0058150/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ToldYaSo"},"dateCreated":"1999-07-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"The superlative James Bond film","reviewBody":"First of all, I must state for the record, Sean Connery is THE James Bond. Even though the first Bond film I ever saw was "For Your Eyes Only" with Roger Moore. I was very young and very much drawn in. I have seen every one of the Bond films and without a doubt, "Goldfinger" is the finest the 007 saga has to offer.

Before I had begun an appreciation of the Connery films, i.e. before I'd seen them, a good friend and cartooning mentor, Ross Paperman, sorted me out. He helped me see how Connery's Bond was suave and sophisticated but also demonstrated a quality the other Bonds do not portray: fear. Not a panicky soil-your-pants kind of fear, mind you. But Connery's Bond actually has a few anxious, sweat-soaked-brow moments. A perfect example is when Bond is strapped to a table as Goldfinger's captive with a laser beam primed to cut him in half. 007 has to think fast. "Do you expect me to talk?" "No, Mr. Bond, I expect you to die!" A famous scene and line from Bond's most enjoyable film.

Perhaps what makes the earlier films more enjoyable is that they had fresh, innovative elements that have now become cliché and gimmicky. The new films are often stale and already covered ground and they don't even appear to be trying anymore.

But it's more than that. Even watching "Goldfinger" today, having seen all the latest in special effects and technology that Hollywood has to offer, it still is riveting and thoroughly entertaining. That is also without the added advantage of being overly nostalgic about "Goldfinger". How could I? I hadn't even been born when it first hit theaters, and it was far from my first 007 experience. The story, the characters and the fun of "Goldfinger" is timeless and if given a chance could probably rope in a whole new generation of fans. It just doesn't seem likely to happen.

Much of the satire from the Austin Powers films is directly derived from the Connery films, especially "Goldfinger" and "Dr. No", proving their lasting effect on popular culture. As well, John Barry's scores from the Connery films are finding their way into the ears of a new generation through pop music as snippets from his soundtracks are sampled by such artists as Robbie Williams, Mono and Curve, to name a few.

But if by some fluke you read this and you haven't seen "Goldfinger" yet, do yourself right and acquaint yourself with the real James Bond. You'll probably be hooked by the time you hear Shirley Bassey's voice in the famous opening theme.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":181545,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1964-09-20","keywords":"official james bond series,gold,aston martin,race against time,british secret service","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Goldfinger","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2383218457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ4NDI5YTEtZGMzMS00ZmM3LWI0YzctYWQ5OWIzYjc3MGYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ4NDI5YTEtZGMzMS00ZmM3LWI0YzctYWQ5OWIzYjc3MGYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Goldfinger"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000125/","name":"Sean Connery"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002085/","name":"Gert Fröbe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000303/","name":"Honor Blackman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0357891/","name":"Guy Hamilton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054040/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0537363/","name":"Richard Maibaum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0214989/","name":"Paul Dehn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001220/","name":"Ian Fleming"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Operation Crossbow
Operacija Grom
programme.desc: Operation Crossbow: Directed by Michael Anderson. With Sophia Loren, George Peppard, Trevor Howard, John Mills. Allied agents attempt to infiltrate the Nazis' rocket research site." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0059549/","name":"Operation Crossbow","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWZkZGQwZjctYWI4MS00MmY1LTg0OWUtMGNlOTE1NWMyMTcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQzNDI3NzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Allied agents attempt to infiltrate the Nazis' rocket research site.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0059549/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bb64"},"dateCreated":"2005-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Secret Mission To Destroy The German V-1 & V-2 Weapons Threatening England","reviewBody":"This is actually a very good movie with a lot more truth behind it than one might imagine. As this is a British movie, it was a very smart marketing idea to have a famous American actor, George Peppard, and a famous Italian actress, Sophia Loren, co-star in it. This way they could say "Starring (insert famous British actor name here)" when marketed in Britain, and advertise it as "Starring George Peppard" and "Starring Sophia Loren", when marketed in the U.S.A.and Italy respectively. This gives the makers of the film a much larger audience than just Britain. George Peppard and Sophia Loren have significant roles, but are not the stars of the movie. Details like portraying Hanna Reitsch and having accurate, and very good special effects make this far better than most World War II movies. Especially since most of the stars of the movie don't survive. If you enjoy historical accuracy, a well thought-out plot, and the unexpected, then I think you will find this movie a top-notch production and well worth watching. Without spoiling the ending, I will tell you though that the Gemans did not win the war.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4604,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"1965-08-30","keywords":"rocket,v2,spy thriller,british,world war two","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000047/","name":"Sophia Loren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000577/","name":"George Peppard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002145/","name":"Trevor Howard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0027183/","name":"Michael Anderson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071784/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0171385/","name":"Duilio Coletti"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0678008/","name":"Vittoriano Petrilli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0696247/","name":"Emeric Pressburger"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
programme.desc:
Whiskey Tango Foxtrot: Directed by Glenn Ficarra, John Requa. With Tina Fey, Margot Robbie, Martin Freeman, Alfred Molina. A journalist recounts her wartime coverage in Afghanistan." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3553442/","name":"Whiskey Tango Foxtrot","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIxOTIzMTM5OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDIxNTA1NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A journalist recounts her wartime coverage in Afghanistan.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3553442/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Dr_Sagan"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well balanced movie...","reviewBody":"W.T.F. is a movie which tries to belong in too many genres simultaneously, including Comedy, Drama, Romance, War, Action, Documentary, and has a statement to make about pretty much everything including long-distance relationships, politics, professionalism, cultural differences etc. etc.

Without excelling in any of that, it manages to be a well balanced movie in the 110 minutes of its duration.

Tina Fey plays Kim Barker, a real person and an actual journalist, who is dissatisfying from her career covering low profile stories, and decides to go to Afghanistan as a war correspondent for a few months, or so she thought...

The movie has a good structure. It starts as a comedy, something you might expect because of the main actress, but soon the situations become real and more dramatic.

The rest of the cast includes well known actors like Alfred Molina, Billy Bob Thornton, Martin Freeman and Margot Robbie.

Overall: Don't expect a comedy because of Tina Fey. It starts like that but it evolves to other genres really quick. It might not be a great movie but it's not boring and you get something out of the inner journey of the protagonist. How easy is to feel unnatural situations as normal when you are a long way from home..."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51515,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-03-04","keywords":"afghanistan,journalist,karaoke,dancing,infidelity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2132324889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4NjkyODc3MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTcxNTA1NzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4NjkyODc3MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTcxNTA1NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on the Kim Barker's memoir, Tina Fey plays a journalist reporting from war-town Afghanistan and Pakistan."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275486/","name":"Tina Fey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3053338/","name":"Margot Robbie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0293509/","name":"Martin Freeman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275629/","name":"Glenn Ficarra"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0720135/","name":"John Requa"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013731/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0199243/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1061622/","name":"Robert Carlock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5092324/","name":"Kim Barker"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bik Eneich: Un fils
Sin
programme.desc: Bik Eneich: Un fils: Directed by Mehdi Barsaoui. With Sami Bouajila, Najla Ben Abdallah, Youssef Khemiri, Noomen Hamda. 11 year old Aziz needs a liver transplant after being seriously injured during a terrorist ambush while on holiday in 2011. At the hospital a family secret will be revealed." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10749760/","name":"Bik Eneich: Un fils","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGFlM2U3ZDItMDEzNC00YjhkLTkyMmUtMjY2Yjg1MDdiY2MyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjgzMjQ0MTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"11 year old Aziz needs a liver transplant after being seriously injured during a terrorist ambush while on holiday in 2011. At the hospital a family secret will be revealed.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10749760/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mbrcf"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Solid film from a new voice in Arab cinema","reviewBody":"If you enjoy Asghar farhadi's films, then this is the right film for you. The script follows exactly the method of an unfortunate accident causing turmoil and chaos in a seemingly healthy family and then things start becoming interesting, secrets deeply buried surface, old forgotten grudges start to poke and so on.\n\nEven though it's a directorial debut of Mehdi Barsaoui, The film is really well made, there are some scenes that you would only expect from masters of filmmaking. Without trying to spoil any parts of the story, my only issue was that the film puts finger on so many conflicts, whether political, cultural or religion related in a rather short runtime (96 minutes) and the inevitable is that many ascepts, some really important ones, are left out or just briefly mentioned. I think this is caused by the ambitious mentality of the director as he tried do to score as high as possible. Yet still this is a good film from a new voice.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":811,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-03-11","keywords":"troubled family,father son relationship,mother son relationship,husband wife relationship,tunisian lebanese production","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [English SUB]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi872529433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmJhZTVhZWQtZmMzNC00NGRjLWJjOTMtZjY3ZGJlZTlmYzU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmJhZTVhZWQtZmMzNC00NGRjLWJjOTMtZjY3ZGJlZTlmYzU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0098793/","name":"Sami Bouajila"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5858261/","name":"Najla Ben Abdallah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10923123/","name":"Youssef Khemiri"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5421179/","name":"Mehdi Barsaoui"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0039666/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0246993/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002052/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5421179/","name":"Mehdi Barsaoui"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Samo ti i ja
programme.desc: Osmogodišnja Eva i njezin otac idu u Meksiko velikim kamionom s 18 kotača. Ono što je trebalo biti izlet oca i kćeri postaje iskustvo koje će im otvoriti oči i neočekivano putovanje obmane. Eva (8 godina) i njezin otac putuju iz Montréala do Meksika u velikom kamionu s 18 kotača. Emigrirali su u Quebec prije tri godine i, iako bi ona radije letjela avionom, Eva je vrlo uzbuđena što je na prvom dopustu s ocem.

IMDb data; ttnr: 3553442, Title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot, --- Description: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot: Directed by Glenn Ficarra, John Requa. With Tina Fey, Margot Robbie, Martin Freeman, Alfred Molina. A journalist recounts her wartime coverage in Afghanistan." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3553442/","name":"Whiskey Tango Foxtrot","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIxOTIzMTM5OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDIxNTA1NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A journalist recounts her wartime coverage in Afghanistan.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3553442/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Dr_Sagan","dateCreated":"2016-06-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well balanced movie...","reviewBody":"W.T.F. is a movie which tries to belong in too many genres simultaneously, including Comedy, Drama, Romance, War, Action, Documentary, and has a statement to make about pretty much everything including long-distance relationships, politics, professionalism, cultural differences etc. etc.

Without excelling in any of that, it manages to be a well balanced movie in the 110 minutes of its duration.

Tina Fey plays Kim Barker, a real person and an actual journalist, who is dissatisfying from her career covering low profile stories, and decides to go to Afghanistan as a war correspondent for a few months, or so she thought...

The movie has a good structure. It starts as a comedy, something you might expect because of the main actress, but soon the situations become real and more dramatic.

The rest of the cast includes well known actors like Alfred Molina, Billy Bob Thornton, Martin Freeman and Margot Robbie.

Overall: Don't expect a comedy because of Tina Fey. It starts like that but it evolves to other genres really quick. It might not be a great movie but it's not boring and you get something out of the inner journey of the protagonist. How easy is to feel unnatural situations as normal when you are a long way from home...","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51515,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-03-04","keywords":"afghanistan,journalist,karaoke,dancing,infidelity","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2132324889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4NjkyODc3MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTcxNTA1NzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4NjkyODc3MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTcxNTA1NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on the Kim Barker's memoir, Tina Fey plays a journalist reporting from war-town Afghanistan and Pakistan.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275486/","name":"Tina Fey","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3053338/","name":"Margot Robbie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0293509/","name":"Martin Freeman"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275629/","name":"Glenn Ficarra","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0720135/","name":"John Requa"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013731/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0199243/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1061622/","name":"Robert Carlock","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5092324/","name":"Kim Barker"],"duration":"PT1H52M"</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 9179616, Title: Vienna Blood, --- Description: Vienna Blood: Created by Steve Thompson. With Matthew Beard, Jürgen Maurer, Charlene McKenna, Conleth Hill. Max Liebermann, a student of Sigmund Freud, helps Detective Rheinhardt in the investigation of a series of disturbing murders around the grand cafes and opera houses of 1900s Vienna." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt9179616/","name":"Vienna Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA3MjRiMDAtZTNlNy00ZGUyLTg5MmUtM2RmMDc4NzRlYzUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjI4NzUwNzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Max Liebermann, a student of Sigmund Freud, helps Detective Rheinhardt in the investigation of a series of disturbing murders around the grand cafes and opera houses of 1900s Vienna.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9179616/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"pontram","dateCreated":"2019-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very fine murder Mystery","reviewBody":"First to say, it's not Sherlock & Watson. It's more of a team player effort. Of course, Both main characters, Lieberman and the inspector, have to come together from very diametrical positions of how a case should be solved. The term of 'profiler' is used, and I'm quite sure that's for the audience only, and wasn't known then. But they may have had a similiar name for a killer's extrapolated personality. Acting is really very good, and Mathew Beard is just optimal for Liebermann, exploring new methods of deduction and investigation. Very high production values, meticulously catching the flair of the young 20th century during the short time when Vienna was the capital of a huge empire, where the Jews tried to find their place by assimilating themselves. There is always some dry humor present, which makes the show a very pleasant watch. Directing by Robert Dornhelm in the first episode is great. Tension is built very well until the case is solved in a nice finale. Of course Vienna is the third main Character, as it is shown in most of it's remaining Glory from the old days. There are some small references to the famous 'Third Man', or I thought to recognise them. In this first episode most of the secondary characters did not get much attention, but I hope this will change in later episodes. I hope the coming episodes are equally high in quality to the first one.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3336,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-11-18","keywords":"fin de siecle,austria,vienna austria,police detective,vienna police department","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0063914/","name":"Matthew Beard","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0561029/","name":"Jürgen Maurer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1800670/","name":"Charlene McKenna"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0104998/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0115148/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078814/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1839162/","name":"Steve Thompson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer - Season 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1751432729","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmMxMWI2ZDUtYzdkNi00NDc3LWExNDEtNmFkNjVlOTA1NDNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXN3aWZ0dw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmMxMWI2ZDUtYzdkNi00NDc3LWExNDEtNmFkNjVlOTA1NDNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXN3aWZ0dw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Max Liebermann, a student of Sigmund Freud, helps Detective Rheinhardt in the investigation of a series of disturbing murders around the grand cafes and opera houses of 1900s Vienna."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Agatha and the Truth of Murder
Agatha and the Truth of Murder
programme.desc: Agatha and the Truth of Murder: Directed by Terry Loane. With Dean Andrews, Ruth Bradley, Bebe Cave, Amelia Dell. In 1926, with her personal life in tatters and her writing in crisis, a young Agatha Christie decides to solve a real-life murder." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9381998/","name":"Agatha and the Truth of Murder","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTRmYTdlODgtYWRlMy00ZjU5LThkZjQtZDZhZTkzYTczZThlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzY0MTE3NzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1926, with her personal life in tatters and her writing in crisis, a young Agatha Christie decides to solve a real-life murder.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9381998/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Tweekums"},"dateCreated":"2018-12-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"A fictional idea about what happened during Agatha Christie's real disappearance","reviewBody":"In 1926 the authoress Agatha Christie famously disappeared for eleven days then reappeared claiming no knowledge of what happened; this story imagines what might have happened. Agatha is suffering writer's block and her husband is seeking a divorce; then she is approached to solve a real murder. Initially unenthusiastic she later agrees and starts investigating. Pretending to be a lawyer named Mary Westmacott she assembles the suspects, with the lure of a large inheritance and starts questioning them. She quickly realises that real mysteries and works of fiction are quite different.\n\nI confess I was a little unsure about the premise of putting a real person in an obviously fictional situation... but surprisingly it really works if you can suspend your disbelief somewhat. The story nicely combines known facts about her life at the time with an interesting fiction. The mystery she investigates has the feel of one of her stories, perhaps somewhat helped by the way the time period is captured. There are a good number of suspects, each with their own motives, as well as one or two red herrings. The cast are really good; most notably Ruth Bradley as Agatha Christie, Pippa Haywood, as the woman who brought the mystery to her and Tim McInnerny as one of the suspects. As stated before it is necessary to suspends one's disbelief at times; noticeably towards the end when a local policeman recognises our protagonist but does tell the authorities despite it being made clear that there is a nationwide manhunt for her. Overall though this was a fine murder mystery that could easily have come from the pen of the great women herself.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4519,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-04-19","keywords":"1920s,year 1926,interwar period,agatha christie character,character name in title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Agatha and the Truth of Murder TRAILER","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1511307801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWRkMzMxMzYtMTc5ZS00ZmQ1LTg2Y2QtOTRkNDNkZmZkZjYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWRkMzMxMzYtMTc5ZS00ZmQ1LTg2Y2QtOTRkNDNkZmZkZjYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1080214/","name":"Dean Andrews"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1094112/","name":"Ruth Bradley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3019183/","name":"Bebe Cave"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0516384/","name":"Terry Loane"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000130/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0800044/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0725498/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3666261/","name":"Tom Dalton"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 1734537, Title: Agatha Christie's Marple, --- Description: Agatha Christie's Marple: With Geraldine McEwan, Julia McKenzie, Stephen Churchett, Isabella Parriss. An elderly spinster living in the village of St. Mary Mead, helps her friends and relatives solve mysterious murders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1734537/","name":"Agatha Christie's Marple","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDdhMzBlOWEtOWZiYi00NzRmLTgxMTktZDBkOWY0NmI5ODc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjExMjk0ODk@._V1_.jpg","description":"An elderly spinster living in the village of St. Mary Mead, helps her friends and relatives solve mysterious murders.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1734537/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Kirpianuscus","dateCreated":"2018-07-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"versions","reviewBody":"The key for taste this serie , in my case, was to ignore the portrait of Miss Marple created by Agatha Christie. because each actress in this role, gives her nuances and colors and accents to it. so, the war was between Geraldine Mc Ewan and Julia McKenzie. both are admirable. the difference - maybe the manner to define the character. in the case of lady McEwan , the good intention was the lead aspect. the hard try to give to her character consistence. the result was decent and honorable. Julia McKenzie propose, maybe, a more familiar version. more comfortable. and , at first sigh, more inspired.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7246,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2004-12-12","keywords":"united kingdom,murder,detective,female detective,england","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0568603/","name":"Geraldine McEwan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0571549/","name":"Julia McKenzie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0161410/","name":"Stephen Churchett"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0104279/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103605/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0041824/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Agatha Christie's Marple: The Julia McKenzie Collection","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4158173977","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTA0OWUwNDEtNjBmMS00OTQ4LThmOWItYTBkNDY4M2RhYWRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTA0OWUwNDEtNjBmMS00OTQ4LThmOWItYTBkNDY4M2RhYWRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Agatha Christie's Marple: The Julia McKenzie Collection"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Murdoch Mysteries
Murdoch Mysteries
programme.sub-title: S11 E17 S11 E17 Shadows Are Falling

credits.actor: Hélène Joy, Yannick Bisson, Thomas Craig, Jonny Harris, Lachlan Murdoch, Mouna Traoré

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 1091909, Title: Murdoch Mysteries, --- Description: Murdoch Mysteries: Created by Cal Coons, Alexandra Zarowny, Maureen Jennings, Bob Carney. With Yannick Bisson, Helene Joy, Thomas Craig, Jonny Harris. In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1091909/","name":"Murdoch Mysteries","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNjkzNDU4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDUxMTAyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1091909/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"llawrance1972","dateCreated":"2010-04-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"A fun, yet thoughtful show.","reviewBody":"I caught 'The Murdoch Mysteries' by accident while drifting around the satellite channels and was instantly hooked. A well performed, touching and interesting show caught my eye. The characters are involving, are worth caring about and have a strong sense of purpose. Each one brings something to the mix and adds their own skills to the events of each episode. Each episode has a strong mystery to be solved, sometimes offering an intriguing moral dilemma to both Murdoch and the viewer. It is also very reassuring to not have modern day morality thrust into the past as happens so frequently with other shows (yes 'Dr Quinn Medicine Woman', I mean you), dealing with the nineteenth century. Instead we are allowed to explore the world as they see it, enjoying the discoveries and trying to find a way forward into a new century. Well done to all concerned and long may it continue.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12047,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-01-01","keywords":"detective,police detective,morgue,police station,whodunit","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0084370/","name":"Yannick Bisson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0431420/","name":"Helene Joy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186030/","name":"Thomas Craig"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014501/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0382999/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052272/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1779939/","name":"Cal Coons","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953567/","name":"Alexandra Zarowny","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1485610/","name":"Maureen Jennings"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2131996697","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8"</script><metacontent="

Each episode has a strong mystery to be solved, sometimes offering an intriguing moral dilemma to both Murdoch and the viewer. programme.title: Murdoch Mysteries
Murdoch Mysteries
programme.sub-title: S11 E4 The Canadian Patient
programme.desc: Murdoch Mysteries: Created by Cal Coons, Alexandra Zarowny, Maureen Jennings, Bob Carney. With Yannick Bisson, Helene Joy, Thomas Craig, Jonny Harris. In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1091909/","name":"Murdoch Mysteries","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNjkzNDU4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDUxMTAyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1091909/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"llawrance1972"},"dateCreated":"2010-04-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"A fun, yet thoughtful show.","reviewBody":"I caught 'The Murdoch Mysteries' by accident while drifting around the satellite channels and was instantly hooked. A well performed, touching and interesting show caught my eye. The characters are involving, are worth caring about and have a strong sense of purpose. Each one brings something to the mix and adds their own skills to the events of each episode. Each episode has a strong mystery to be solved, sometimes offering an intriguing moral dilemma to both Murdoch and the viewer. It is also very reassuring to not have modern day morality thrust into the past as happens so frequently with other shows (yes 'Dr Quinn Medicine Woman', I mean you), dealing with the nineteenth century. Instead we are allowed to explore the world as they see it, enjoying the discoveries and trying to find a way forward into a new century. Well done to all concerned and long may it continue.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12047,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-01-01","keywords":"detective,police detective,morgue,police station,whodunit","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0084370/","name":"Yannick Bisson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0431420/","name":"Helene Joy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186030/","name":"Thomas Craig"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014501/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0382999/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1779939/","name":"Cal Coons"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953567/","name":"Alexandra Zarowny"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1485610/","name":"Maureen Jennings"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2131996697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8"}}</script><metacontent="
